text:
In today’s lesson you have the opportunity
to learn with an incredible English teacher,

Leo Gomez from Learn YOUR English. And at the same time, you
will greatly improve your vocabulary and pronunciation!

But before we jump into this exciting lesson, I wanted to let you
know that every week we help you to understand fast speech,

without getting lost, without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles. Like Phani

who says that our lessons have
helped them learn grammar and vocabulary

and now they can understand
natives no matter how fast we speak!

You will, too, just hit the subscribe button and bell
down below so you don’t miss a single lesson!

Do you want to confidently
understand English and speak naturally?

A great way to do this is
with our Fluent with Friends course.

In this course, you will learn
the secrets of how natives really speak

and get the vocabulary that you
really need for everyday conversation.

Plus, you will have a ton of fun learning with the TV series Friends,
which various academic studies show

is the best show to learn English.
What are you waiting for? You can try it for free right now

with our 3-part masterclass. Just click here or in the
description below to learn more and sign up.
So now you will test everything you learned today

by watching the clips without subtitles
and answering some quiz questions.

By the way, the whole conversation
I had with Leo was incredible.

This is just a excerpt from the
full interview, which you can listen to for free
by clicking the link down in the description below!
